verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> the things which we have <S%G3004>spoken<s%> this is the <S%G2774>sum<s%>: We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> an high <S%G749>priest<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> is <S%G2523>set<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of the <S%G3172>Majesty<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%>;

A <S%G3011>minister<s%> of the <S%G39>sanctuary<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4078>pitched<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>. of the sanctuary: or, of holy things

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> high <S%G749>priest<s%> is <S%G2525>ordained<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%>: <S%G3606>wherefore<s%> it is of <S%G316>necessity<s%> that this <S%G5126>man<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3739>to<s%> <S%G4374>offer<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3303><s%> he <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%>, he <S%G302>should<s%> <S%G3761>not<s%> <S%G2258>be<s%> a <S%G2409>priest<s%>, seeing that there <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> that <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%>: there: or, they are priests

<S%G3748>Who<s%> <S%G3000>serve<s%> unto the <S%G5262>example<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of heavenly <S%G2032>things<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was admonished of <S%G5537>God<s%> when he was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G2005>make<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%>, <S%G3708>See<s%>, saith <S%G5346>he<s%>, that thou <S%G4160>make<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G5179>pattern<s%> <S%G1166>shewed<s%> to <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> hath he <S%G5177>obtained<s%> a more <S%G1313>excellent<s%> <S%G3009>ministry<s%>, by how <S%G3745>much<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3316>mediator<s%> of a <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> was <S%G3549>established<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1860>promises<s%>. covenant: or, testament

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> covenant had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G273>faultless<s%>, then <S%G302>should<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> have been <S%G2212>sought<s%> for the <S%G1208>second<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> finding <S%G3201>fault<s%> with <S%G846>them<s%>, he <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, the <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>, <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>when<s%> I will <S%G4931>make<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2455>Judah<s%>:

<S%G3756>Not<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I made <S%G4160>with<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> when I <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> by the <S%G3450>hand<s%> <S%G5495><s%> to <S%G1806>lead<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt<s%>; <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1696>continued<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%>, and <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G272>regarded<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G272>not<s%>, <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I will <S%G1303>make<s%> with the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>; I will <S%G1325>put<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3551>laws<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1271>mind<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1924>write<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> a <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G2992>people<s%>: put: Gr. give in: or, upon

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1321>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4139>neighbour<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1097>Know<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> shall <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3398>least<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G3173>greatest<s%> <S%G846><s%>.

<S%G1722>In<s%> that he <S%G3004>saith<s%>, A <S%G2537>new<s%> covenant, he hath <S%G3822>made<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3822>old<s%>. <S%G1161>Now<s%> that which <S%G3822>decayeth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> waxeth <S%G1095>old<s%> is <S%G1451>ready<s%> to vanish <S%G854>away<s%>.
